channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Saudi Official Accuses U.A.E. of Helping Yemeni Separatist to Escape
item.description: Aidarous al-Zubaidi is wanted on treason charges in Yemen after he led a lightning military offensive that escalated a bitter feud between the Emirate...

item.title: An Oval Office Viewing
item.description: During an interview with our reporters, President Trump discussed a video of an ICE agent fatally shooting a woman in Minneapolis.

item.title: Lebanon Claims Progress in Disarming Militant Groups Like Hezbollah
item.description: The military said it had completed the first phase of a plan to demilitarize armed groups as fears grew that Israel was preparing a new offensive agai...

item.title: State Department suspends all U.S. aid to Somalia, citing ‘zero-tolerance policy for waste, theft, and diversion of life-saving assistance’
item.description: The suspension comes as the Trump administration has ratcheted up criticism of Somali refugees and migrants in the United States.

item.title: Push to Audit Private Equity and Venture Capital Falters Under Trump
item.description: Specialists have left the I.R.S. and audits have been abandoned since the president returned to office.

item.title: Google and Character.AI agree to settle lawsuits over teen suicides linked to AI chatbots
item.description: The cases include claims that a chatbot engaged a 14-year-old in sexualized conversations before his death and encouraged another teen to harm his par...

item.title: Tesla’s vote wasn’t about pay. It was about who really runs the company
item.description: At Tesla’s 2025 Annual Meeting, investors chose to evaluate strategy, incentives, and governance on their own terms.

item.title: We Pressed Trump on His Conclusion About the ICE Shooting in Minneapolis. Here’s What He Said.
item.description: The exchange was a glimpse into the president’s reflexive defense of his federal crackdown on immigration.

item.title: Rubio Says He’ll Discuss Greenland With Danish Officials Next Week

item.title: Leading the agentic enterprise: What the next wave of AI demands from CEOs
item.description: With agentic AI on board, companies must rethink their very makeup: how work is designed, how decisions are made, and how value is created.

item.title: Nonprofits are solving 21st century problems—they need 21st century tech
item.description: Every once in a while, history presents us with moments that demand a fundamental shift in approach. This is one of those moments.
